title: So... Xayah
body:
Yes, something something edgy weeblord supreme something something

but all appearances aside, the mechanics behind her as a champion are engaging and there are ways to outplay and be outplayed. 

Overall, from a purely mechanical standpoint, she seems like a solid champion and I enjoy playing as her. I used to play adc a lot, and yes, adc in 2017 lul, but I feel like I have at least a moderate impact in team fights. Though I have barely played her because new champ etc, I think she is one i will add to my adc roster. I haven't liked a new champ in a long time, but tbh, she seems like a good fit. 

Although lets be honest, she is kinda overtuned if she gets even a small lead. Once people figure out how to build her she'll be a lot more OP
